title: Zingerman's Guide to Good Eating: How to Choose the Best Bread, Cheeses, Olive Oil, Pasta, Chocolate, and Much More
description: A practical handbook for food lovers explains how to select the finest and most flavorful ingredients and pantry staples, offering a host of ingenious buying recommendations, entertaining anecdotes, cooking suggestions, and simple recipes. Simultaneous.
author: Ari Weinzweig
